revised_title: Vapor Pressure and Osmotic Pressure of Aqueous Solutions of Cane Sugar and Methyl Glucoside
tldr: The authors improved the apparatus and method for determining osmotic pressures from vapor-pressure measurements in aqueous solutions of cane sugar and methyl glucoside. They found that the method is accurate and applicable for various solutions, and the experimental error is reduced. The research focuses on the compressibilities of the solutions and the determination of the absolute vapor density of water vapor in air.
